tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE consumer_behavior_data (
    consumer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    income DECIMAL,
    purchase_history JSONB,
    marketing_campaign VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE research_proposal (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  proposal_name TEXT,
  researcher_name TEXT,
  research_topic TEXT,
  budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE consumer_behavior_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp DATETIME,
  consumer_id INT,
  action_taken TEXT,
  product_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Customer (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE Purchase (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    product_name VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketResearch (
    research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    research_topic VARCHAR,
    research_date DATE,
    researcher_name VARCHAR,
    result_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  email VARCHAR(255),
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE Purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  purchase_date DATE,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);
